title: Microsoft and Esri to speed up access to Earth-observation data
summary: Esri is closely integrating its ArcGIS geographic mapping platform with Microsoft Azure Space.

title: Intelsat and Aalyria aim for “subsea cables in space”
summary: Global satellite fleet operator Intelsat announced an agreement Sept. 12 with Aalyria Technologies to dramatically speed up satellite communications.

title: Axiom Space names crew for third private astronaut mission to ISS
summary: NASA and the other partners on the International Space Station have approved the crew of the third private astronaut mission by Axiom Space, scheduled to launch in early 2024.

title: SpaceX’s Starlink partners with European satellite giant SES for combined cruise market service
summary: PARIS – European satellite operator SES is teaming up with SpaceX’s Starlink to offer a combined service to cruise operators, the companies announced on Wednesday.

title: Starlink and SES join forces for multi-orbit cruise connectivity
summary: SpaceX and SES are pooling their broadband satellites to offer cruise operators an integrated service promising up to 3 gigabits per second of capacity per ship.
